name: Play Hotch Potch with Mistertronic
overview: 10 screens of appealing shapes for younger children. The computer mixes them up and by pressing certain keys the child can reconstruct the image. The aim is to do this in as few moves as possible. Although this is, at first, not easy it can be great fun for all the family and the program will help children to understand the logical reconstruction of shapes which is so important in the early learning years.
